title: Generation of Motor Neurons from Human Induced Pluripotent Stem Cells Using Small Chemical Molecules
details: M Sepehrimanesh, B Ding - Human Induced Pluripotent Stem Cells, 2024
abstract: Motor neurons (MNs) play a critical role in regulating both voluntary and involuntary movements, and their dysfunction underlies various movement-related disorders. The generation of patient-specific MNs provides an unprecedented approach for …
